description.name: Hi, I'm Maicon Friedel!
description.part1: I'm a fullstack developer since 2018, with a lot of experience in C# with the .NET platform, as well as front-end development using React.
description.part2: I've participated in the development of many integrations with different systems, using REST APIs, C# with .NET and Microsoft SQL Server.
description.part3: I enjoy exploring new technologies and have a great interest in Node.js with TypeScript.
description.part4: I'm also interested in the world of data science, particularly with Python, Pandas, and Apache Airflow. But I'm just getting started on this journey.
description.part5: You can find my skills and projects in the respective tabs above.
